record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2556
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2556 -- (Senate - January 25, 2008)

[Page: S305]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand S. 2556 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2556) to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007 for an additional 30 days.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
